result.reason: New feature to link the connection panel to the currently active tab for improved usability and navigation.
result.approach: Implement modifications in ConnectionTab to manage a reference to a ConnectionTree panel, dynamically updating its content based on the active connection within the tab. Adjust PanelBinder to establish and maintain this connection between the tab and the panel.
